message: I've reserved a suite at the Hyatt and will be stocking it with beer for a get together tomorrow night. Look for me tomorrow for an invite to the get together, a ShootQ sticker, and details on the positions we have available!

I'll be at the Celery talk first thing in the morning, where one of ShootQ's Code Poets will be presenting. Find me there, anywhere around PyCon, email me (jonathan@shootq.com), DM me (@cleverdevil), or contact me here.
Make sure to update this topic w/ info ;)
Does Ryan get a bonus if he does well here?
That's okay - celery's good for non-web work as well.
And that beer will be free.
@mishok13 nope, we're just trying to meet people who are interested, and connect with the Python community as a whole.
ha, you probably wont be looking for non-us residents
though i'm totally not a web guy :)
mmmm, beer :)
do i have to take my resume to have a beer?
i'm just looking to hang out with interesting people and celery does sound interesting to me
alright
@donspaulding I like the way you think.
Details – see us TONIGHT at 8:00 PM in Suite 1906!
Oh, and there will be beer.
Feel free to email me resumes, though (jonathan@shootq.com)
Yeah, US residents only (at the moment), but come have a beer!
By the way, if you have trouble getting up to the suite tonight, you can always call me (404-784-1081) and I'll come and grab ya!
REMINDER: Suite 1906 at 8:00 PM!
See you there
Late arrivals accepted?
